name: Prolensa
indications: prolensa ®is indicated treatment postoperative inflammation reduction ocular pain patients undergone cataract surgery .
contraindications: instill one drop affected eye daily beginning 1 day prior surgery , continued day surgery , first 14 days postsurgery . ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: prolensa ® ( bromfenac ophthalmic solution ) 0.07 % supplied white ldpe plastic squeeze bottle 15 mm ldpe white dropper tip 15 mm polypropylene gray cap follows : ndc 24208-602-03 3 ml 7.5 ml bottle storage store 15ºc 25ºc ( 59ºf 77ºf ) . opening , prolensa used expiration date bottle .
indications_original:
PROLENSA
 
  ®is indicated for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and reduction of ocular pain in patients who have undergone cataract surgery.
contraindications_original: Instill one drop into the affected eye once daily beginning 1 day prior to surgery, continued on the day of surgery, and through the first 14 days postsurgery. ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
PROLENSA
 
  ®(bromfenac ophthalmic solution) 0.07% is supplied in a white LDPE plastic squeeze bottle with a 15 mm LDPE white dropper tip and 15 mm polypropylene gray cap as follows:

 
                  
                     NDC 24208-602-03 3 mL in a 7.5 mL bottle
                  
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  Store at 15ºC to 25ºC (59ºF to 77ºF). After opening, PROLENSA can be used until the expiration date on the bottle.
